file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: NHSE-I-AAC API
  version: 0.0.1
servers:
  - url: 'https://nhse-${ENV}-innovation-service-functions.azurewebsites.net/api'
paths:
  /survey:
    post:
      tags:
        - Survey
        - Create
      description: Creates a Survey object with answers
      operationId: survey-create-one
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/survey-create-payload'
      responses:
        '201':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/survey-create-201'
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
        '422':
          description: UnprocessableEntity
  /accessors:
    get:
      tags:
        - Accessor
        - List
      description: Retrieves the list of all accessors
      operationId: accessors-get-all
      parameters:
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
      security:
        - OpenId:
            - accessors_list
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
        '404':
          description: Not Found
  '/accessors/{userId}/innovations':

      tags:
        - Accessor
        - Innovation
        - GetInnovations
      description: Gets an Accessor's Innovations
      operationId: accessors-get-all-innovations

components:
  schemas:
    accessor-schema:
      type: object
      properties:
        type:
          type: string

          type: string
          format: uuid
        attributes:
          type: object
          properties:
            userId:
              type: string
              format: uuid
            createdAt:
              type: string
              format: date-time
            updatedAt:
              type: string
              format: date-time
    accessor-get-innovations:
      type: object
      properties:
        links:
          type: object
          properties:
            self:
              type: string
            next:
              type: string
            last:
              type: string
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/innovation-schema'
    accessor-get-innovations-advanced:
      type: object
      properties:
        links:
          type: object
          properties:
            self:
              type: string
            next:
              type: string
            last:
              type: string
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/innovation-schema'
    innovator-schema:
      type: object
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        attributes:
          type: object
          properties:
            userId:
              type: string
              format: uuid
            createdAt:
              type: string
              format: date-time
            updatedAt:
              type: string
              format: date-time
    innovation-schema:
      type: object
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
          maxLength: 40
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        attributes:
          type: object
          properties:
            ownerId:
              type: string
              format: uuid
            title:
              type: string
              maxLength: 150
            createdAt:
              type: string
              format: date-time
            updatedAt:
              type: string
              format: date-time
    organisation-schema:
      type: object
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
          maxLength: 40
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        attributes:
          type: object
          properties:
            id:
              type: string
            type:
              type: string
            name:
              type: string
              maxLength: 150
            size:
              type: string
              maxLength: 150
            isShadow:
              type: boolean
            createdAt:
              type: string
              format: date-time
            updatedAt:
              type: string
              format: date-time
    survey-schema:
      type: object
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
          maxLength: 40
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        attributes:
          type: object
          additionalProperties: true
          minProperties: 1
    innovator-get-all:
      type: object
      properties:
        links:
          type: object
          properties:
            self:
              type: string
            next:
              type: string
            last:
              type: string
        data:
          type: array
          items:

    organisations-get-all:

      properties:

          properties:

            next:
